Nightlight:

Nightlight shook her head in disbelief and followed the other =
Maximals

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>=
 wrote:
>
> > <OLD>
> >
> > "One question, Guliedart"said Nightlight alsmor=
 surpriced by her own
> > bold"What happened to... Rodimus? what havde you =
done with him???"
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> "I??" GUILEDART said as he glared at NIGH=
TLIGHT, "What have I done
> with your precious Rodimus?" He asked in danger=
ous tones. "I have done
> nothing with him." He stated firmly. "He belongs =
to Magmatron and
> Saberback." When GUILEDART said SABERBACK it sounded lik=
e he were
> spitting out something putrid and disgusting.
> 
> "That is som=
ething else that is wrong." GUILEDART said, "Why would
> Magmatron keep aro=
und one like Rodimus? Something that could
> conceivably be so dangerous." =
He shook his head, "Ever since Saberback
> returned to us, he has been chan=
ged, different and that has rubbed off
> on others."
> 
> GUILEDART looked =
at NIGHTLIGHT and then the other MAXIMALS and pointed
> at the door again, =
"Now go!"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
